title: This Week's Top Stories - Trump Attacks Vote Counting, LGBTQ Victories & Drug Decriminalization
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Trump Attacks Vote Counting, LGBTQ Victories & Drug Decriminalization
description:
President Trump rages against vote counting, LGBTQ candidates win big in Congress, marijuana is decriminalized in several states, and angry Trump supporters take to the streets.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
